### Objectives

In this lab we begin working in RStudio to examine data sets.  In solving the exercises below, we practice 

(a) inputing and importing data sets in *RStudio*,
(b) determining summary statistics, 
(c) presenting data visually, and
(d) Using *R Markdown* to write a lab report.
